message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value for us and is estimated to be worth $1200000 to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer you this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $1150000. This is an exceptional chance to secure such a valuable asset at a price that is just slightly above its intrinsic worth, providing you with significant savings. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.
